description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger An ally within 30 feet would be reduced to 0 HP but not immediately killed.

You give a daring yowl, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness. Your ally isn't knocked out and remains at 1 Hit Point. Their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded] condition still increases by 1 as though they had been @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dying] and recovered.
